resources.string: "Yada wasa allon na'urarka zuwa masu saka idanu na waje"
"Ja ƙasa don samun damar hanyar sarrafawa, kunna simintin shirya wasa, sannan nemo na'urori da ke kusa."

You can project items from your Xiaomi tablet on most Xiaomi TV models with Bluetooth capabilities without turning on Miracast manually. If you need to turn on Miracast, press the [MENU] button and start casting by using the option for other Android phones.
"Yada wasa gabatarwar zuwa TV ɗin ku yayin da kuke canza nunin faifai da duba bayanai daga na'urar ku. ​"
"Yada wasanni daga na'urar ku zuwa TV ɗin ku."
